document.full_text: bahrain remains committed to dialogue with the opposition but restoring security is a priority and more gulf troops will arrive on the island to support its forces, the foreign minister said on friday.
document.title: bahrain to pursue dialogue, get more gulf troops
lines_and_colors: bahrain remains committed to dialogue with the opposition but restoring security is a priority and more gulf troops will arrive on the island to support its forces, the foreign minister said on friday.
